name: Luigi Fan's Basics 4 A Whole New School

description: Hey Welcome To New School Buddy Bois! Ok Story After Puppet Escaped Luigi Fan's Basics 3 Later Luigi Fan Builds New School Called Luigi Fan's Basics 4 Quincy Needs Collect All Seven Memes Because His Mom And Sister Wants Mark Auer as Luigi Fan Luigi Aiden as Himself Leland as Himslef Kwy as Himself  Credits BJ as BJette and Glitch BJ Vinnie and Vinnette and Mary Slikk  Welcome Back Buddy!
